noblehowl.desc: Raises the user's Attack by two stages and cures the user of burns, paralysis, and poison. Removes Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, and Mist from the opponent's side and removes Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web from both sides.
noblehowl.shortDesc: Raises Attack by 2, clears hazards/user status.
noblehowl.name: Noble Howl

toomuchsaws.desc: Base Power doubles if the foe switches out the turn this move is used.
toomuchsaws.shortDesc: Power doubles if foe switches out.
toomuchsaws.name: Too Much Saws

sparcedance.desc: Boosts the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by one stage.
sparcedance.name: Sparce Dance

energyfield.desc: Has a 40% chance to paralyze the target. Lowers the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage.
energyfield.shortDesc: 40% to paralyze. Lowers user's SpA, SpD, Spe.
energyfield.name: Energy Field

compost.desc: The user recovers half their HP. If any of the user's allies fainted the previous turn, this move heals the active Pokemon by 50% of the user's HP on the following turn. Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
compost.shortDesc: Heal 50%; cures party; If ally fainted last turn: wish.
compost.name: Compost

turismosplash.desc: Summons Trick Room and raises the user's Special Attack by one stage.
turismosplash.shortDesc: User's Sp. Atk +1; sets Trick Room.
turismosplash.name: Turismo Splash

pilfer.desc: If the target uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals the move to use itself. This move fails if no move is stolen or if the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
pilfer.shortDesc: Steals foe's move. Fails if target attacks. Priority.
pilfer.name: Pilfer

truant.desc: The target's ability is changed to Truant if this move hits.
truant.shortDesc: Changes the target's ability to Truant.
truant.name: TRU ANT

murkyambush.desc: This move fails unless a foe uses a contact move on the user before the user can execute the move on the same turn. If this move is successful, the foe's move has its secondary effects suppressed and damage halved. If the user survives a hit, it attacks, and the effect ends.
murkyambush.shortDesc: User must be hit by a contact move before moving.
murkyambush.name: Murky Ambush

trashalanche.desc: This move's Base Power increases by 20 for every foe that is not holding an item.
trashalanche.name: Trashalanche

comeonyougunners.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate. If the target has the same type as this move, its Base Power is boosted by 1.5x.
comeonyougunners.shortDesc: Type = Plate. 1.5x power if foe has the move's type.
comeonyougunners.name: Come on you Gunners

buzzingoftheswarm.desc: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.
buzzingoftheswarm.name: Buzzing of the Swarm

finalimpact.desc: This move summons Rain Dance and boosts the user's Defense by one stage.
finalimpact.name: Final Impact

foodrush.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out to a random non-fained ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups ability, or is behind a Substitute.
foodrush.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.
foodrush.name: Food Rush

thousandcircuitoverload.desc: If the target is a Ground-type and is immune to Electric due to its typing, this move deals neutral damage regardless of other types, and the target loses its type-based immunity to Electric.
thousandcircuitoverload.shortDesc: First hit neutral on Ground; removes its immunity.
thousandcircuitoverload.name: Thousand Circuit Overload

blusterywinds.desc: Removes Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web from both sides, and it removes any active weather condition or Terrain.
blusterywinds.shortDesc: Removes all field conditions and hazards.
blusterywinds.name: Blustery Winds

wondertrade.desc: Replaces every non-fainted member of the user's team with a Super Staff Bros. Brawl set that is randomly selected from all sets, except those with the move Wonder Trade. Remaining HP and PP percentages, as well as status conditions, are transferred onto the replacement sets This move fails if it's used by a Pokemon that does not originally know this move. This move fails if the user is not bumbadadabum.
wondertrade.shortDesc: Replaces user's team with random StaffBros. sets.
wondertrade.name: Wonder Trade

aesthetislash.desc: Summons Grassy Terrain. If the user is an Aegislash, it changes forme to Aegislash-Blade, attacks, then goes back to its base forme.
aesthetislash.name: a e s t h e t i s l a s h

restartingrouter.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages and its Speed by 1 stage.
restartingrouter.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2 and Speed by 1.
restartingrouter.name: Restarting Router

bringerofdarkness.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. Sets one layer of Spikes on the opponent's side of the field and boosts a random stat of the user by one stage, excluding accuracy and evasion, that is not already at maximum.
bringerofdarkness.shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep. Sets 1 Spike. Boosts a stat.
bringerofdarkness.name: Bringer of Darkness

blimpcrash.desc: 80% Accuracy if target is grounded. The user and the target will be grounded, and the user will take 1/2 of the damage inflicted as recoil.
blimpcrash.shortDesc: 80 Acc vs grounded, grounds both sides, 1/2 recoil.
blimpcrash.name: Blimp Crash

forcewin.desc: Confuses the target and subjects it to the effects of Taunt, Torment, Heal Block, and Embargo.
forcewin.name: Forcewin

beskyttelsesnet.desc: The user faints and sets Reflect, Light Screen, and Safeguard.
beskyttelsesnet.shortDesc: User faints; sets screens/Safeguard for 5 turns.
beskyttelsesnet.name: beskyttelsesnet

lovingembrace.desc: This move has a 50% chance to infatuate the target.
lovingembrace.shortDesc: This move has a 50% chance to infatuate the target.
lovingembrace.name: Loving Embrace

luciddreams.desc: The foe falls asleep and is inflicted with the effects of Nightmare and Leech Seed. The user loses 1/2 of their maximum HP unless this move had no effect.
luciddreams.shortDesc: Loses 1/2 HP. Foe: sleep, Nightmare, Leech Seed.
luciddreams.name: Lucid Dreams

earthsblessing.desc: Sets Gravity, raises the user's Attack by 2 stages, and cure's the user's burn, paralysis, or poison. Fails if Gravity is already in effect.
earthsblessing.shortDesc: Sets Gravity, raises Attack by 2, cures status.
earthsblessing.name: Earth's Blessing

holyduck.desc: If this attack hits, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end on the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
holyduck.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.
holyduck.name: Holy Duck!

fangofthefireking.desc: Deals 111 HP of damage and burns the target. If the target already has a status ailment, it is replaced with a burn. Fails if the target is a Fire-type or if the user is not a Fire-type.
fangofthefireking.shortDesc: Dmg=111HP; replace status w/burn; fail if foe=Fire.
fangofthefireking.name: Fang of the Fire King

doom.desc: Summons Sunny Day after doing damage.
doom.shortDesc: Summons Sunny Day after doing damage.
doom.name: DOOM!

ancestralpower.desc: The user's Attack and Special Attack are raised by one, it transforms into a different Pokemon, and it uses a move dependent on the Pokemon; Celebi (Future Sight), Jirachi (Doom Desire), Manaphy (Tail Glow), Shaymin (Seed Flare), or Victini (V-Create). Reverts to Mew and loses the initial raises of 1 stage to Attack and Special Attack at the end of the turn.
ancestralpower.shortDesc: For turn: transforms, boosts, uses linked move.
ancestralpower.name: Ancestral Power

quack.desc: Boosts the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
quack.shortDesc: Raises the user's Def, Sp. Def, and Spe by 1.
quack.name: Quack

evoblast.desc: This move's type changes to match the user's primary type. This move is a physical attack if the user's Attack stat is greater than its Special Attack stat; otherwise, it is a special attack.
evoblast.shortDesc: Shares user's type. Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk.
evoblast.name: Evoblast

frck.desc: Does not check accuracy. KOes the foe. User faints afterwards if move hits.
frck.shortDesc: KOes foe. Always hits. User faints after on success.
frck.name: fr*ck

rickrollout.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
rickrollout.shortDesc: Raises Speed by 2; 30% chance to confuse target.
rickrollout.name: Rickrollout

purplepills.desc: The user gains a random typing and 3 moves based on that typing (2 special moves and 1 status move). The user's attacks deal damage based off the user's Special Defense. If used again, returns the user to its original moveset and typing. This move fails if the user is not Forrce.
purplepills.shortDesc: Forrce: Gains 3 random moves and typing.
purplepills.name: Purple Pills

paintrain.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
paintrain.shortDesc: Stronger if user is heavier; Heals 50% of damage.
paintrain.name: Pain Train

hazardpass.desc: The user sets 2 of Stealth Rock, Spikes (1 layer), Toxic Spikes (1 layer), and Sticky Web on the foe's side of the field and then switches out.
hazardpass.shortDesc: Sets 2 random hazards, then switches out.
hazardpass.name: Hazard Pass

mainstreamshock.desc: This move's type effectiveness against Dark is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
mainstreamshock.name: Mainstream Shock

scriptedterrain.desc: Sets Scripted Terrain for 5 turns. The power of Bug type moves is boosted by 1.5, and there is a 5% chance for every move used to become Glitch Out instead. At the end of a turn, every Pokemon has a 5% chance to transform into a Missingno. with 3 random moves and Glitch Out. Switching out will restore the Pokemon to its normal state. This terrain affects floating Pokemon.
scriptedterrain.name: Scripted Terrain

glitchout.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Celebrate, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Endure, Feint, Fleur Cannon, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, Instruct, King's Shield, Light of Ruin, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mind Blown, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Photon Geyser, Plasma Fists, Protect, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Relic Song, Secret Sword, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Spectral Thief, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Steam Eruption, Struggle, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Transform, Trick, Trump Card, V-create, or Wide Guard. The selected move's Base Power is increased by 20.
glitchout.shortDesc: Uses a random move with Base Power +20.
glitchout.name: Glitch Out

flowertornado.desc: Has a 20% chance to either poison the target or cause it to fall asleep.
flowertornado.shortDesc: 20% chance to either poison or sleep target.
flowertornado.name: Flower Tornado

hurl.desc: Sets a layer of Toxic Spikes.
hurl.shortDesc: Sets a layer of Toxic Spikes.
hurl.name: Hurl

delayedpromise.desc: This move bypasses Baneful Bunker, Crafty Shield, Detect, King's Shield, Mat Block, Protect, Quick Guard, Substitute, Spiky Shield, and Wide Guard. The target's stat stages are set to 0, and the target's Speed is lowered by 1 after stats are reset. 75% chance to put the target to sleep.
delayedpromise.shortDesc: Foe: Resets stats; -1 Speed; 75% chance to sleep.
delayedpromise.name: Delayed Promise

boi.desc: The user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
boi.name: B O I

vbora.desc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions, then poisons the user.
vbora.shortDesc: Cures party's statuses, then poisons self.
vbora.name: Víbora

wyvernswail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
wyvernswail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.
wyvernswail.name: Wyvern's Wail

bestialstrike.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
bestialstrike.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases.
bestialstrike.name: Bestial Strike

maelstrm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. Both of these effects persist for their normal duration even if the user switches out or faints. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if the target leaves the field or uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
maelstrm.shortDesc: Traps/damages for 4-5 turns, even if user returns.
maelstrm.name: Maelström

inkzooka.desc: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
inkzooka.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Def, Sp. Def, and Spe by 1.
inkzooka.name: Inkzooka

dragonwarriortouch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
dragonwarriortouch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt; Atk +1.
dragonwarriortouch.name: Dragon Warrior Touch

nextlevelstrats.desc: The user gains 5 levels when using this move, which persist upon switching out.
nextlevelstrats.name: Next Level Strats

barfight.desc: Raises both the user's and the target's Attack by 3 stages, lowers the Defense of both by 3 stages, confuses both Pokemon, and has a 100% chance to cause the target to flinch.
barfight.shortDesc: +3 Atk, -3 Def, confusion to user & target. Priority.
barfight.name: Bar Fight

letitgo.desc: Summons hail. Has a 15% chance to lower the target's Special Defense, and a 5% chance to freeze it.
letitgo.shortDesc: Summons hail; 15% to lower SpD, 5% to freeze.
letitgo.name: Let it Go

shuffleramendance.desc: This move's type effectiveness is inverted, meaning that it's super effective on Water-types but not very effective on Grass-types, and so forth. 20% chance to paralyze the target.
shuffleramendance.name: Shuffle Ramen Dance

naptime.desc: The user falls asleep for the next turn, restoring 50% of its HP and curing itself of any major status condition. If the user falls asleep in this way, all other active Pokemon that are not asleep or frozen also try to use Nap Time. Fails if the user has full HP, if the user is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
naptime.shortDesc: Active Pokemon sleep 1 turn, restoring HP/status.
naptime.name: Nap Time

blazeofglory.desc: The user's HP is restored to maximum, and the user then faints. The target then takes damage equal to the amount of HP the user lost. This move does not check accuracy.
blazeofglory.shortDesc: Does damage equal to user's max. HP. User faints.
blazeofglory.name: Blaze of Glory

crystalboost.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
crystalboost.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk. by 1.
crystalboost.name: Crystal Boost

typeanalysis.desc: If the user is a Silvally, its item becomes a random Memory whose type matches one of the target's weaknesses, it changes forme, and it uses Multi-Attack. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon. Fails if the target has no weaknesses or if the user's species is not Silvally.
typeanalysis.shortDesc: Changes user/move type to a weakness of target.
typeanalysis.name: Type Analysis

scavengesu.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Special Attack by two stages, and then swaps all of its stat changes with the target.
scavengesu.shortDesc: Harshly lowers own Atk/SpA; swaps stats with opp.
scavengesu.name: /scavenges u

tippingover.desc: Power rises by 20 for each of the user's positive stat stage changes. The user loses any defensive boosts not from Stockpile.
tippingover.shortDesc: +20 power per boost. Removes non-Stockpile boosts.
tippingover.name: Tipping Over

cyclonespin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.
cyclonespin.shortDesc: Frees user from hazards/partial trap/Leech Seed.
cyclonespin.name: Cyclone Spin

pythonivy.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
pythonivy.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def. and Spe by 1.
pythonivy.name: Python Ivy

proteinshake.desc: The user's Attack, Defense, and Speed are boosted by 1 stage. The user also gains 100kg of weight.
proteinshake.shortDesc: +1 Atk, Def, and Spe. User gains 100kg.
proteinshake.name: Protein Shake

e.desc: Sets Trick Room for 5 turns and raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
e.name: E

prismaticterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Prismatic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Ice-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5, even if the user is not grounded. Hazards are removed and cannot be set while Prismatic Terrain is active. Fails if the current terrain is Prismatic Terrain.
prismaticterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. No hazards,-Ice power even if floating.
prismaticterrain.name: Prismatic Terrain

pyramidingsong.desc: If the target has not fainted, both the user and the target are forced to switch out and be replaced with a chosen unfainted ally. The target's replacement has its Speed lowered by 1 stage. Fails if either Pokemon is under the effect of Ingrain or Suction Cups.
pyramidingsong.shortDesc: Both Pokemon switch. Opp. replacement: Spe -1.
pyramidingsong.name: Pyramiding Song

omboom.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Speed by 2 stages.
omboom.shortDesc: Has 50% chance to raise the user's Speed by 2.
omboom.name: OM Boom

nightmarch.desc: Power is equal to 60+(20*X), where X is the total number of fainted Pokemon on both the user's team and on the opponent's team.
nightmarch.shortDesc: +20 power for each fainted ally or foe.
nightmarch.name: Night March

totalleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
totalleech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
totalleech.name: Total Leech

jailshell.desc: This move has a 50% change to paralyze the target and prevents the target from switching out or using any moves that the user also knows while the user is active.
jailshell.shortDesc: 50% chance to paralyze. Traps and imprisons.
jailshell.name: Jail Shell

corrosivetoxic.desc: Badly poisons the target, even if they are Poison-type or Steel-type. This move does not check accuracy.
corrosivetoxic.shortDesc: Badly poisons the target, regardless of type.
corrosivetoxic.name: Corrosive Toxic

lilypadshield.desc: The user is protected from most moves made by other Pokemon during this turn, and if a Pokemon makes contact with the user, the user restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, Wide Guard, or this move, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
lilypadshield.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: restores 25% HP.
lilypadshield.name: Lilypad Shield

resolve.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 1 stage. Gives Focus Energy
resolve.shortDesc: Raises user's Speed by 1; Focus Energy.
resolve.name: Resolve

literallycheating.desc: For seven turns, any Pokemon that has one of their stats boosted through any manner loses all PP on the last move they used.
literallycheating.shortDesc: 7 turns: boosting stat: lose all PP from last move.
literallycheating.name: Literally Cheating

switchoff.desc: Before doing damage, the target's stat boosts are inverted. Ignores Ground-type immunity. The user switches out after damaging the target.
switchoff.shortDesc: Hits Ground. Inverts target's boosts, then switches.
switchoff.name: Switch Off

soulbend.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage. Has a 10% chance to summon either Reflect or Light Screen.
soulbend.shortDesc: Atk, Spe +1; 10% chance to set one screen.
soulbend.name: Soulbend

thicc.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
thicc.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.
thicc.name: Thicc

extrathicc.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage. Summons Hail and Aurora Veil.
extrathicc.shortDesc: User's atk and acc +1. Sets Hail and Aurora Veil.
extrathicc.name: Extra T h i c c

goinda.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages and Speed by 1 stage.
goinda.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 and Speed by 1.
goinda.name: GO INDA

alienwave.desc: For 5 turns, slower Pokemon move first. Psychic-type attacks can hit if the target is a Dark-type.
alienwave.shortDesc: Creates Trick Room; 5 turns: Psychic hits Dark.
alienwave.name: Alien Wave

fakeclaim.desc: The user creates a substitute to take its place in battle. This substitute is a Pokemon selected from a broad set of Random Battle-eligible Pokemon able to learn the move chosen as this move's base move. Upon the substitutes creation, this Pokemon's ability is suppressed until it switches out. The substitute Pokemon is generated with a Random Battle moveset with maximum PP that is added (except for duplicates) to the user's moveset; these additions are removed when this substitute is no longer active. The substitute uses its species's base stats, types, ability, and weight but retains the user's max HP, stat stages, gender, level, status conditions, trapping, binding, and pseudo-statuses such as confusion. Its HP is 100% of the user's maximum HP. When this substitute falls to zero HP, it breaks, and the user reverts to the state in which it used this move. This substitute absorbs indirect damage and authentic moves but does not reset the counter of bad poison when broken and cannot be transfered through Baton Pass. Transforming into this substitute will not fail. If the user switches out while the substitute is up, the substitute will be removed and the user will revert to the state in which it used this move. This move's properties are based on the move Fake Claim is inheriting from.
fakeclaim.shortDesc: Uses a Random Battle Pokemon as a Substitute.
fakeclaim.name: Fake Claim

armyofmushrooms.desc: Before the turn starts, this Pokemon boosts its Defense and Special Defense by one stage and uses Powder on the target. When this move hits, this Pokemon uses Sleep Powder and Leech Seed. This move's priority is -1 and cannot be boosted by Prankster.
armyofmushrooms.shortDesc: +1 Def/SpD, Powder, Leech Seed, Sleep Powder.
armyofmushrooms.name: Army of Mushrooms

zekken.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages and its Speed by 1 stage.
zekken.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 and Speed by 1.
zekken.name: Zekken

groundsurge.desc: This move's type effectiveness against Ground is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
groundsurge.name: Ground Surge

rotate.desc: The user's replacement will switch out after using their move on the next turn if the replacement's move is successful.
rotate.shortDesc: User's replacement will switch after using its move.
rotate.name: Rotate

ultrasucc.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
ultrasucc.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.
ultrasucc.name: Ultra Succ

gyroballin.desc: Base Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1. Summons Trick Room unless Trick Room is already active.
gyroballin.shortDesc: More power if slower; sets Trick Room.
gyroballin.name: Gyro Ballin'

devolutionwave.desc: This move hits 5 times. After the first hit, the target is either badly poisoned or paralyzed. After the second hit, the user swaps abilities with the target, or the target gains the Water type. After the third hit, Stealth Rock or one layer of Spikes is added to the opponent's side of the field. After the fourth hit, Grassy Terrain or Misty Terrain is summoned. After the fifth hit, the user's Attack or Defense is raised by 1.
devolutionwave.shortDesc: Hits 5 times with various effects on each hit.
devolutionwave.name: Devolution Wave

smokebomb.desc: Moves all hazards that are on the user's side of the field to the foe's side of the field. Sets Stealth Rock on the foe's side, after which the user switches out.
smokebomb.shortDesc: Hazards -> foe side. Set SR. User switches out.
smokebomb.name: Smoke Bomb

minisingularity.desc: This move's Base Power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if its weight is less than 25 kg, 60 if its weight is less than 50 kg, 80 if its weight is less than 100 kg, 100 if its weight is less than 200 kg, and 120 if its weight is greater than or equal to 200 kg. After doing damage, the target's item is replaced with an Iron Ball, and the target's weight is doubled.
minisingularity.shortDesc: BP:weight; increases foe weight; foe item=Iron Ball.
minisingularity.name: Mini Singularity

continuous1v1.desc: Fully restores the user's HP if this move knocks out the target.
continuous1v1.shortDesc: Fully restores user's HP if this move KOes the target.
continuous1v1.name: Continuous 1v1

holyorders.desc: Summons two of Attack Order, Defense Order, and Heal Order at random to combine for some assortment of the following effects: has a Base Power of 90 and a higher chance for a critical hit, raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage, and heals the user by half of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
holyorders.shortDesc: Summons two of Attack, Defense, and Heal Order.
holyorders.name: Holy Orders

explosivedrain.desc: The user recovers half the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held, the user recovers 1.3x the normal amount of HP, rounded half down.
explosivedrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
explosivedrain.name: Explosive Drain

stunningdance.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch and a 100% chance to paralyze the target. Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
stunningdance.shortDesc: 20% to flinch; 100% to paralyze; traps target.
stunningdance.name: Stunning Dance

blehflame.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by 1 stage.
blehflame.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).
blehflame.name: Bleh Flame

cutieescape.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The opponent is confused, trapped, and infatuated regardless of the replacement's gender. This move fails unless the user already took damage this turn.
cutieescape.shortDesc: If hit; switches out + confuses, traps, infatuates.
cutieescape.name: Cutie Escape

relicsongdance.desc: Hits twice and ignores type immunities. Before the second hit, the user switches to its Pirouette forme, and this move's second hit deals physical Fighting-type damage. After the second hit, the user reverts to its Aria forme. Fails unless the user is Meloetta.
relicsongdance.shortDesc: One hit each from user's Aria and Pirouette formes.
relicsongdance.name: Relic Song Dance

mylife.desc: Badly poisons all Pokemon on the field.
mylife.shortDesc: Badly poisons all Pokemon on the field.
mylife.name: My Life
